title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement in the Java perspective.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences > Workbench. The build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus, which is incorrect.
EB: The "Build" action should not be enabled in the popup menu if the build is already done automatically on resource modification.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Observe the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective and verify that the "Build" action is still enabled.
